message:
白色背景上的黄色文本，例如这样
This text is placeholder text to give you an idea of how this color looks when used as a font color on a black background. The following sentence uses every English character: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. Bold text.Italic text. With Underline.
title: 不能分辨黄色和白色属于色盲吗？
